definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
the Wolf prize (for science and arts)

sentences.english: Whorf, we now know, made many mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们知道，沃尔夫当时的确犯了许多错误。

sentences.english: I now believe Wolfsheim is a madman.
sentences.chinese: 我现在相信沃尔夫希姆是个疯子。

sentences.english: Wolff reached for his drink and drained the glass.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔夫伸手去取杯子，然后一饮而尽。

sentences.english: FSV Mainz 05 but returned at the end of the season to Wolfsburg.
sentences.chinese: 美茵茨，但在返回本赛季结束后沃尔夫斯堡。

sentences.english: For decades, Whorf's theory dazzled both academics and the general public alike.
sentences.chinese: 数十年来，沃尔夫的理论让学界和大众颇为不解。

sentences.english: Wolfgangsee is one of the many lakes in the Salzkammergut region.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔夫冈湖是萨尔兹卡么古特区众多湖泊中的一个。

sentences.english: Discuss the Sapir-Whorf hypothesis and its relation culture.
sentences.chinese: 讨论萨丕尔一沃尔夫假说及其与文化。

sentences.english: Mr. Carraway , this is my friend Mr. Wolfsheim.
sentences.chinese: 卡罗威先生，这是我的朋友沃尔夫山姆先生。

sentences.english: Wolfsburg look a little lost right now.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔夫斯堡现在有些迷茫。

sentences.english: Commander Wolffe's clone troopers have stylized wolf muzzles painted on their helmets.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔夫指挥官的克隆人士兵的头盔上都绘有狼脸图形。

sentences.english: On the mountain, we could see the beautiful Wolfgangsee.
sentences.chinese: 在山上，我们可以看到美丽的沃尔夫冈湖。

sentences.english: Whorf proposed first that all higher levels of thinking are dependent on language.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔夫首先提出，所有高层次的思维都倚赖于语言。

sentences.english: Wolff watched it plummet toward a ravaged area of woodland.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔夫注视着它垂直掉落在一片被毁坏的林地中。

sentences.english: Wolfe embraced his new life with gusto.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔夫满腔热忱地迎接新生活。

sentences.english: For Wolfe, the old payment world is a vestigial appendage.
sentences.chinese: 对沃尔夫来说，以前的支付方式是老掉渣的东西。

sentences.english: His performance in Wolfsburg was world class.
sentences.chinese: 他在同沃尔夫斯堡队比赛中的表现是世界级的。

definition: Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
